arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِيْ مِنْ لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً ۖ إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ الدُّعَآءِ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
My Lord! grant me from Thee good offspring; surely Thou art the Hearer of prayer.
transliteration: rabbi hab lī min ladunka dhurriyyatan ṭayyibah ۖ innaka samī`ud du`ā
